Derivatives and Hedging: other comprehensive income loss reclassification adjustment from a o c i on derivatives net of tax
other comprehensive income reclassification adjustment on derivatives included in net income net of tax
other comprehensive income unrealized gain loss on derivatives arising during period net of tax
Foreign Currency Translation: other comprehensive income loss foreign currency transaction and translation adjustment net of tax
Other OCI: defined benefit plan remeasurement of net liabilities
other comprehensive income defined benefit plans net unamortized gain loss arising during period net of tax
other comprehensive income loss pension and other postretirement benefit plans adjustment before reclassification adjustments net of tax
other comprehensive income loss pension and other postretirement benefit plans remeasurement of net liabilities and translation net of tax
other comprehensive income loss reclassification adjustment from a o c i pension and other postretirement benefit plans net of tax
Total Other Comprehensive Income: other comprehensive income loss net of tax portion attributable to parent
Unrealized Gains/Losses on Securities: other comprehensive income unrealized holding gain loss on securities arising during period net of tax

Other Equity Adjustments: adjustments to additional paid in capital other

Exercise of Stock Options: stock issued during period shares stock options exercised
stock options excercises r s us converted
stock options exercises r s us p s u s pepunits converted
Other Stock Issuance: convertible preferred stock converted to other securities
stock issued during period shares acquisitions
stock issued during period shares conversion of convertible securities
Stock-Based Compensation: adjustments to additional paid in capital sharebased compensation requisite service period recognition value
Total Stock Issuance Value: stock issued during period value stock options exercised

Stock Repurchases: stock redeemed or called during period shares
stock redeemed or called during period value
treasury stock value acquired cost method
Tax Effects from Stock Compensation: adjustments related to tax withholding for share based compensation
adjustments to additional paid in capital tax effect from share based compensation
payments related to tax withholding for share based compensation
restricted stock withholding taxes recorded as net settlement
__unmapped__: acquisitions and divestitures to noncontrolling interest
common stock dividends per share declared
minority interest decrease from distributions to noncontrolling interest holders
minority interest increase decrease from contributions from or distributions to noncontrolling interest members
net income loss attributable to noncontrolling interest
